Medicare Provider Enrollees

Source: R/enrollees.R
enrollees.Rd

Individual & Organizational Enrollment-level Data on Providers Actively Approved to Bill Medicare.

Usage

enrollees(
  npi = NULL,
  pac = NULL,
  enid = NULL,
  spec_code = NULL,
  spec_desc = NULL,
  state = NULL,
  first = NULL,
  middle = NULL,
  last = NULL,
  org = NULL,
  gender = NULL,
  limit = 5000
)

Arguments

npi

<chr> 10-digit Individual NPI

pac

<chr> 10-digit PECOS Associate Control (PAC) ID

enid

<chr> 15-digit Medicare Enrollment ID

spec_code

<chr> Enrollment specialty code

spec_desc

<chr> Enrollment specialty description

state

<chr> Enrollment state abbreviation

first, middle, last

<chr> Individual provider's name(s)

org

<chr> Organizational provider's name

gender

<chr> Individual provider's gender:

  • "F" (Female)

  • "M" (Male)

  • "9" (Unknown/Organization)

limit

<int> Maximum number of search results; default is 5000

Value

<tibble> of search results

Accrual Periodicity

  • Quarterly (R/P3M)

Links

  • Enrollment API

  • Enrollment Data Dictionary

Examples

enrollees(enid = "I20040309000221")
#> ℹ 1 Result ☰ 1 Request
#>   
#> # A tibble: 1 × 11
#>   V1         V2         V3       V4    V5    V6    V7    V8    V9    V10   V11  
#>   <chr>      <chr>      <chr>    <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>
#> 1 1417918293 3870481252 I200403… 14-41 PRAC… FL    STEV… D     SHEI… ""    M    

enrollees(npi = "1417918293", spec_code = "14-41")
#> ℹ 1 Result ☰ 1 Request
#>   
#> # A tibble: 1 × 11
#>   V1         V2         V3       V4    V5    V6    V7    V8    V9    V10   V11  
#>   <chr>      <chr>      <chr>    <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>
#> 1 1417918293 3870481252 I200403… 14-41 PRAC… FL    STEV… D     SHEI… ""    M
